title: ACMeasurement schema
description: The Data Model intended to measure the electrical energies consumed by an electrical system which uses an Alternating Current (AC) for a three-phase (L1, L2, L3) or single-phase (L) and neutral (N). It integrates the initial version of the data Modem [THREEPHASEMEASUREMENT], extended to also perform single-phase measurements. It includes attributes for various electrical measurements such as power, frequency, current and voltage.

type.description: Property. NGSI property type. It has to be ACMeasurement

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date and time of this observation represented by an ISO8601 UTC format. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval to separate attributes `dateObservedFrom`,`dateObservedTo`

dateObservedFrom.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Observation period: Start date and time in an ISO8601 UTC format. The attribute can be used in addition to the `dateObserved` attribute when it corresponds to a time interval to be highlighted

dateObservedTo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Observation period: End date and time in an ISO8601 UTC format. The attribute can be used in addition to the `dateObserved` attribute when it corresponds to a time interval to be highlighted

refDevice.description: Property. Reference to the devices which captured this observation. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

refTargetDevice.description: Relationship. Reference to a list of the devices for which the measurement was taken

phaseType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of Phase. A unique value. Enum:'singlePhase, threePhase'

frequency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The frequency of the circuit. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Hertz'

dateEnergyMeteringStarted.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The starting date for metering energy in an ISO8601 UTC format

activeEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Active energy imported i.e. consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilowatt hour'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the active Energy Import

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the active Energy Import

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the active Energy Import

reactiveEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Fundamental frequency reactive energy imported i.e. consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-reactive-hour'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the reactive Energy Import

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the reactive Energy Import

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the reactive Energy Import

apparentEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Apparent energy imported i.e. consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the apparent Energy Import

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the apparent Energy Import

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the apparent Energy Import

activeEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Active energy exported per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilowatt hour'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the active Energy Export

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the active Energy Export

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the active Energy Export

reactiveEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Fundamental frequency reactive energy exported per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-reactive-hour'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the reactive Energy Export

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the reactive Energy Export

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the reactive Energy Export

apparentEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Apparent energy exported per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the apparent Energy Export

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the apparent Energy Export

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the apparent Energy Export

totalActiveEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilowatt hour'

totalReactiveEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to fundamental frequency reactive power). The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-reactive-hour.'

totalApparentEnergyImport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to apparent power). The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour.'

totalActiveEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed . The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilowatt hour'

totalReactiveEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Total fundamental frequency reactive energy exported. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-reactive-hour'

totalApparentEnergyExport.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Total energy exported (with regards to apparent power). The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour'

activePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Active power consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Watt'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the active power

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the active power

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the active power

reactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Fundamental frequency reactive power. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'volts-ampere-reactive'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the reactive power

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the reactive power

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the reactive power

apparentPower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Apparent power consumed per phase. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Watt'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the apparent power

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the apparent power

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the apparent power

totalActivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Active Power consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Watt'

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Reactive Power consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'volt-ampere-reactive'

totalApparentPower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total Apparent Power consumed. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'volt-ampere'

powerFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Power factor for each phase

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the power factor

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the power factor

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the power factor

displacementPowerFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Displacement power factor for each phase. The quantity is based on the fundamental frequency of the system

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the displacement Power Factor

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the displacement Power Factor

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the displacement Power Factor

totalPowerFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Sum of Power factor including all phases

totalDisplacementPowerFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Sum of Displacement power factor including all phases. The quantity is based on the fundamental frequency of the system

current.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Electrical current. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Ampere'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the current

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the current

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the current

N.description: Property. Value for phase neutral of the current

phaseVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. The voltage between each phase and neutral conductor. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Volts'

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the voltage

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the voltage

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the voltage

thdVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Total harmonic distortion of voltage for each phase

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the thd voltage

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the thd voltage

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the thd voltage

thdCurrent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Total harmonic distortion of current for each phase

L1.description: Property. Value for phase 1 of the thd current

L2.description: Property. Value for phase 2 of the thd current

L3.description: Property. Value for phase 3 of the thd current

phaseToPhaseVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Voltage between phases. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes). Units:'Volts'

L12.description: Property. Value for phase 1 to phase 2 voltage

L23.description: Property. Value for phase 2 to phase 3 voltage

L31.description: Property. Value for phase 3 to phase 1 voltage
